meanings.sent1: After losing the game, they will redefeat their opponents in the rematch.
meanings.sent2: The team will try to redefeat their rivals in the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The superhero had to redefeat the villain for the second time.
meanings.sent4: She managed to redefeat her fear of public speaking.
meanings.sent5: The knight vowed to redefeat the dragon and save the kingdom.

meanings.definition: To overcome or prevail over once more.
meanings.sent1: With determination, she will redefeat the challenges she faced before.
meanings.sent2: He aims to redefeat his previous record in the next race.
meanings.sent3: The student had to redefeat the difficult math problem to pass the test.
meanings.sent4: She was able to redefeat her doubts and pursue her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The team will redefeat their rivals and claim the championship title.
